description: Governed roots definition for HO1 plane. Files in these directories MUST be registered in file_ownership_registry.

notes.G0_behavior: G0 gate validates that every file in governed_roots exists in file_ownership_registry.csv
notes.framework_inheritance: HO1 can reference frameworks from HO2 and HO3
notes.current_state: HO1 has no code assets yet - only ledgers and configuration
